gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Nets 126, Pistons 115
gameRecap.excerpt: The Nets defeated the Pistons, 126-115. Mikal Bridges (29 points, six rebounds, seven assists) and Cam Thomas (20 points) led the Nets as Jaden Ivey (23 points, six rebounds, seven assists) and Cade Cunningham (22 points, six assists) led the Pistons. The Nets snap a 5-game losing streak and improve to 14-15 as the Pistons move to 2-27.
